Sen: Pat Toomey, R-Penn., claimed that Medicaid is contributing to 70 percent of the budget deficit.
Toomey: s office defended their calculation by discussing Medicaid in the context of entitlements and net spending.
Experts criticized Toomey: s calculation, stating that dividing spending by the deficit in the same way would lead to other programs like defense spending being responsible for more than 100 percent of the deficit.
